rows.label: qst202017_0010
rows.name: Oops... I'm starting to get hungry.

rows.label: qst202017_0020
rows.name: Oh my, is it that time already?

rows.label: qst202017_0030
rows.name:
I'll prepare it quickly, 
so please everyone have some too!

rows.label: qst202017_0040
rows.name: So, what's on the menu today?

rows.label: qst202017_0050
rows.name: ...What do you think it is?

rows.label: qst202017_0060
rows.name: Knowing you, it's omusubi, isn't it?

rows.label: qst202017_0070
rows.name: Spot on!

rows.label: qst202017_0080
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]*fit of coughing*

rows.label: qst202017_0090
rows.name: Are you alright?

rows.label: qst202017_0100
rows.name: Ah... don't worry. I just choked a bit...

rows.label: qst202017_0110
rows.name: Musubi is a good girl, isn't she?

rows.label: qst202017_0120
rows.name: Yeah, and her cooking is delicious.

rows.label: qst202017_0130
rows.name: Though, to be fair, she only makes omusubi...

rows.label: qst202017_0140
rows.name:
She might be a bit odd, 
but she's domestic and very caring.

rows.label: qst202017_0150
rows.name: Right...

rows.label: qst202017_0160
rows.name: My life wasn't much to speak of...

rows.label: qst202017_0170
rows.name:
I did some reckless things in my time,
all to be the center of attention.

rows.label: qst202017_0180
rows.name:
And each time, I only caused trouble for Musubi 
and the children.

rows.label: qst202017_0190
rows.name: ...But Musubi stayed with me through it all.

rows.label: qst202017_0200
rows.name:
She even took care of the children 
in place of me and my late wife...

rows.label: qst202017_0210
rows.name:
She's an important part of the family, 
both to me and the children.

rows.label: qst202017_0220
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]*large cough*

rows.label: qst202017_0230
rows.name: ...That's why...

rows.label: qst202017_0240
rows.name: I want her to be happy too...

rows.label: qst202017_0250
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]*cough cough*

rows.label: qst202017_0260
rows.name: Old man!

rows.label: qst202017_0270
rows.name: I'm fine. I just need to rest a little...

rows.label: qst202017_0280
rows.name: That seems like the best course of action.

rows.label: qst202017_0290
rows.name: Yes, please don't push yourself.

rows.label: qst202017_0300
rows.name: Old man...?
